name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A staff that harnesses the power of arcane magic.
looks: The Staff of the Arcane has a long, wooden shaft and is adorned with glowing crystals at the top. The crystals emit a soft, pulsating light.

special_effects.spell_amplification: Increases the power of spells cast using the staff.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that can heal wounds and restore health.
looks: The staff has a smooth wooden handle with intricate carvings. At the top of the staff is a crystal orb that emits a soft healing glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Enchanted Staff
description: A staff infused with powerful enchantments.
looks: The staff is made of gleaming golden wood with shimmering crystals adorning its surface. It radiates a magical energy.

name: Wand of Healing
description: A magical wand that can heal wounds and restore vitality.
looks: The wand is made of polished wood with a silver tip. It emits a soft, warm glow.

special_effects.healing_touch: Increases the effectiveness of healing spells and abilities.

name: Iron Shield
description: A sturdy iron shield that provides excellent protection against physical attacks.
looks: The shield is made of solid iron and has a circular shape. It is adorned with decorative engravings and has a leather grip on the back.

special_effects.shield_block: Increases the chance to block incoming attacks.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Mystic Ring
description: A mystical ring with powerful enchantments.
looks: The ring has a simple design with a gleaming gemstone at its center. It emits a faint glow of magical energy.

name: Ring of Regeneration
description: A magical ring that enhances the natural healing ability of the wearer.
looks: The ring is made of shimmering silver and has a small gemstone embedded in the center. It emits a soft, pulsating light.

special_effects.health_regeneration: Increases the rate at which the wearer regenerates health.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate engravings representing the four elements: fire, water, air, and earth. The top of the staff is adorned with a crystal that changes color depending on the element being used.

special_effects.elemental_blast: 25% chance to unleash a powerful elemental blast on hit, dealing additional damage of a random element.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and is topped with a crystal that glows with a soft white light. It emanates a soothing aura.

special_effects.healing_aura: Provides a constant aura of healing that regenerates health over time to the wielder and nearby allies.
